sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
Suppose that the three terms \(n ^2 + p ^2 \), \(no + pq \), and \(o ^2 + q ^2 \) are in continued proportion. Then prove that \(n \), \(o \), \(p \), and \(q \) are in proportion as well. 	
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "$$\text{It is given that $n ^2 + p ^2 $, $no + pq $, and $o ^2 + q ^2 $ are in continued proportion.
So, we can write that 
	$\frac{\input[s1v1]{} ^2 + p ^2 }{\input[s1v2]{}o + pq } = \frac{no + pq }{o ^2 + q ^2 }$}$$"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow (n ^2 + p ^2 )(o ^2 + q ^2 ) = (no + pq )^2
\]
\[
n ^2 o ^2 + n ^2 q ^2 + \input[s2v1]{} ^2 p ^2 + \input[s2v2]{} ^2 q ^2 = n ^2 o ^2 + p ^2 q ^2 + 2nopq 
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow \input[s3v1]{} ^2 q ^2 + o ^2 p ^2 - 2nopq = 0
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow (nq - \input[s3v2]{}p )^2 = 0
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": " 
\[
	\Rightarrow \input[s4v1]{}\input[s4v2]{} - op = 0
\]"}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{n }{\input[s5v1]{}} = \frac{p }{\input[s5v2]{} }
\]

"}, {"id": "s6", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "$$\text{
This means that $n $, $o $, $p $, and $q $ are in proportion as well. 
Hence proved.
\newline}$$

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": ["n", "n"], "text": "$$\text{Since, $n ^2 + p ^2 $, $no + pq $, and $o ^2 + q ^2 $ are in continued proportion, therefore, $\frac{n ^2 + p ^2 }{no + pq } = \frac{no + pq }{o ^2 + q ^2 }$}$$"}, {"data": ["o", "p"], "text": "$$\text{Upon cross-multiplication and opening up the bracket we get:- $n ^2 o ^2 + n ^2 q ^2 + o ^2 p ^2 + p ^2 q ^2 = n ^2 o ^2 + p ^2 q ^2 + 2nopq $}$$"}, {"data": ["n", "o"], "text": "$$\text{Since, $a^2 + b^2 - 2ab = (a - b)^2$, therefore, $(nq - op )^2 = 0$ "}, {"data": ["n", "q"], "text": "$$\text{Equating each term to zero, we get $nq - op = 0$}$$"}, {"data": ["o", "q"], "text": "$$\text{Adding $o p$ and dividing by $o q$ we get $\frac{n }{o } = \frac{p }{q }$}$$ "}, {"data": [], "text": " "}]
